subproject.corporate outcome: Capacities of national and local institutions enhanced to scale up proven MDG acceleration interventions and to plan, monitor, report and evaluate the MDG progress in the context of related national development priorities
subproject.description:
Enhanced capacity of the National Statistical Office and Provincial Statistical Offices and Department of Local Administration to provide support to policy formulation for national, provincial and local decision makers and to provide technical assistance to line ministries and relevant provincial and local agencies in issue related to data quality and availability.
Issues related to gender would be discussed during capacity assessment forums for the National Statistical Office's Statistical Management and Human Development Bureaus.
subproject.title: Capacity Assessment & Capacity
